title: Chaos

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > At night, choose a player. You will use random abilities on the target until either they die or you use 5 abilities. You know which abilities you used.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You must use your ability every night.
> You start with a Powerful autovest. Every time you use 5 abilities in 1 night, gain another Powerful autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Live to see the end of the game.

desc:
Post 3392
*"Time to spin the Wheel of Chaos! Will our random target manage to survive all 5 spins or will they die trying, let's find out!"*
